title: Bioeconomy Accounting Methods and Applications for Latin America
authors:
  - name: Renato Vargas
    affiliation:

  - name: Adrián Rodríguez

  - id: chw

  - id: eclac
    name: Economic Commission for 
          Latin America and The Caribbean
abstract: |
  This paper describes a practical methodology to estimate 
  bioeconomy macroeconomic accounts, based on an extension 
  of the System of National Accounts (SNA), particularly,
  a reordering of classifications within the Supply and Use 
  tables of this system. In contrast to similar studies, we
  propose not to classify economic activities as belonging 
  to the bioeconomy or not _a priori_.
  
bibliography: references.bib
---
